Modifier and Type

Class

Description

`class `

`[AutoFlow](../llmflows/AutoFlow.html "class in com.google.adk.flows.llmflows")`

LLM flow with automatic agent transfer support.

`class `

`[BaseLlmFlow](../llmflows/BaseLlmFlow.html "class in com.google.adk.flows.llmflows")`

A basic flow that calls the LLM in a loop until a final response is generated.

`class `

`[SingleFlow](../llmflows/SingleFlow.html "class in com.google.adk.flows.llmflows")`

Basic LLM flow with fixed request processors and no response post-processing.
